function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Thorough validation and peer review of ontologies by domain experts and public health professionals.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Validation of social media data with traditional surveillance methods, integration of expert domain knowledge, and verification by public health professionals.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Validation of visualization results with traditional epidemiological data, expert review of visualization methods, and integration of spatial-temporal analysis by public health professionals.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Regular update and validation of ontology, integration with real-time data sources","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Quality checks and validation of text mining results, integration with clinical data and expert validation","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Standardization of ontology terms, validation with clinical data, integration with standardized data sources","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Engage domain experts to review and validate the ontology","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Verify the reliability and accuracy of the data sources","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continual research and surveillance for emerging variants of the human coronavirus, as well as ongoing development of new drugs and antibodies.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular updates and revisions of ontologies to reflect new knowledge and understanding of diseases, as well as collaborative efforts to ensure comprehensive coverage.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Thoroughly validate and review the integration of non-biomedical ontologies in infectious diseases ontologies","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement comprehensive testing and validation procedures for ontology development tools","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement a validation process to ensure the accuracy and completeness of the information before dissemination.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct extensive evaluations using a combination of validation methods, including semantic reasoning and competency questions.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Create a comprehensive ontology that models multiple similar diseases, focusing on shared symptoms and biological aspects.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Promote the benefits and importance of using biomedical application ontologies in disease representation","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proper training, use of protective equipment, and adherence to safety guidelines","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict adherence to biosafety protocols, use of personal protective equipment, and proper decontamination procedures","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of infection control measures, regular cleaning and disinfection, and proper waste management","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of alternative drying methods or surfaces for virus testing","category":"Maintaining enclosure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Validation of plaque counting methods and use of multiple assessment techniques","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emphasize the importance of combining uv-c disinfection with standard cleaning practices and other preventive measures.","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Highlight that uv-c disinfection should be an adjunct to standard terminal cleaning of hard surfaces, not a replacement for it.","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proper installation, regular maintenance, and use of protective shields or louvers to prevent direct exposure to uv-c light","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting research to determine the required uv-c irradiation doses, and adapting uvgi systems to deliver higher doses if needed","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting rigorous testing and validation of uvgi systems specifically against sars-cov-2 virions, and transparently reporting the results","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement measures to monitor uv dosage and saturation levels to ensure thorough inactivation","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Research and determine z values for specific viral species to improve predictive accuracy","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure comprehensive understanding of viral species-specific uv inactivation behavior and seek expert guidance","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct a thorough assessment of the room’s ventilation system and airflow patterns to ensure that the assumption of well-mixed air is valid. consider using computational fluid dynamics cfd simulations to model air circulation in the room.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Regularly monitor and calibrate uvgi systems to ensure that the computed average irradiation flux aligns with the desired survival fraction of microbes. consider implementing real-time monitoring and feedback control systems for uvgi exposure.","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Clarify and standardize disinfection methods for consistency and effectiveness","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adopt a standardized approach to uv studies for consistent data interpretation","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Consider alternative methods for incorporating high log reduction values","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use appropriate statistical methods to account for pseudo-replication","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conduct further research to narrow down the range of possible values for c_ur","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use precise measurements and calculations for uv-c dosing based on well-established guidelines and standards. consider multiple validation studies.","category":"Managing drinking water safety measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conduct controlled experiments to validate the performance of the uv fitting against sars-cov-2. utilize real-world testing scenarios to account for varying conditions.","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Verify and validate published literature through independent studies and experiments. emphasize peer-reviewed, well-documented research for benchmarking and evaluation.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct studies that replicate real-world scenarios to accurately assess the effectiveness of uv irradiation on different viruses.","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Invest in more experimental studies on the uv irradiation of aerosolized viruses to fill the knowledge gap.","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Develop uv-c dose calibration methods specifically for liquid suspension scenarios.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conduct extensive research to determine the accurate adjustment coefficient for different virus suspension scenarios.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conduct uv irradiation experiments on aerosols containing sars-cov-2 virus to determine accurate z ur value","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use multiple assumed z ur values to evaluate a range of scenarios and associated irradiation flux requirements","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conduct sensitivity analysis and scenario testing to account for variations in z ur and ventilation rates","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use protective gear like gloves and goggles when handling uv lamps. limit exposure and follow safety guidelines.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct specific research on the susceptibility of the target virus to uv light. use multiple sources of data for comparison and analysis.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Standardize uv irradiation experiment methodologies and dosages. use controlled and replicable conditions for uv disinfection studies.","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Research and develop more effective methods for inactivating coronaviruses","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
